analysis.description:

ConverterRamp.convertSafe (/unique_chucks/12/0x90263ea5c57dc6603ca7202920735a6e31235bb9.sol#1642-1667) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(boughtAmount == (toToken.balanceOf(this)) - prevBalance,Bought amound does does not match)
